full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 226 of 261 1387 LC6Cmax7 Maguire - direct 1 A. This was on the first floor of the residence. It was an office that was located pretty close to the front door. 2 Q. Focusing on the bottom half of the photograph, what was inside the cabinet? 3 A. These were large plastic bins that contained various boxes that had hard drives in them. 4 Q. How were they packaged? 5 A. They were packaged within the box for the hard drive. They also had evidence tape on the exterior of the box. 6 Q. Did the boxes containing hard drives have evidence tape on them when the FBI found them? 7 A. Yes, they did. 8 Q. In other words, did the FBI find them with evidence tape or did you apply evidence tape to the boxes? 9 A. We found them with evidence tape. We did not place that there. 10 Q. As you sit here today, do you have personal knowledge of why there was evidence tape on these boxes? 11 A. No, I don't. 12 Q. Were these drives seized during the course of the search? 13 A. Yes, they were. 14 MS. MOE: Your Honor, if I could just have one moment. 15 THE COURT: You may. 16 MS. MOE: Thank you. Thanks very much. Your Honor, may I approach the witness with Government Exhibit 54? 17 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018563

text_blocks.content: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 226 of 261 1387 LC6Cmax7 Maguire - direct

1 A. This was on the first floor of the residence. It was an office that was located pretty close to the front door. 2 Q. Focusing on the bottom half of the photograph, what was inside the cabinet? 3 A. These were large plastic bins that contained various boxes that had hard drives in them. 4 Q. How were they packaged? 5 A. They were packaged within the box for the hard drive. They also had evidence tape on the exterior of the box. 6 Q. Did the boxes containing hard drives have evidence tape on them when the FBI found them? 7 A. Yes, they did. 8 Q. In other words, did the FBI find them with evidence tape or did you apply evidence tape to the boxes? 9 A. We found them with evidence tape. We did not place that there. 10 Q. As you sit here today, do you have personal knowledge of why there was evidence tape on these boxes? 11 A. No, I don't. 12 Q. Were these drives seized during the course of the search? 13 A. Yes, they were. 14 MS. MOE: Your Honor, if I could just have one moment. 15 THE COURT: You may. 16 MS. MOE: Thank you. Thanks very much. Your Honor, may I approach the witness with Government Exhibit 54?
